sentences.en: A fur coat is incongruous with a bathing suit.
sentences.cn: 皮大衣和游泳衣是不相称的.

sentences.en: He lowered the level of his incongruous falsetto voice.
sentences.cn: 他降低了他那不相称的假嗓子.

sentences.en: His eyes have taken on a strange, incongruous dreamy quality.
sentences.cn: 他的眼睛里呈现着一种奇特的 、 不协调的恍惚神情.

sentences.en: His gesture was so incongruous to the condition she was in.
sentences.cn: 他的手势表情与她此时的处境是这样不相称.

sentences.en: His private opinions were incongruous with his public statements.
sentences.cn: 他私下的见解和公开的谈话相矛盾.

sentences.en: I found the scene somewhat incongruous.
sentences.cn: 我发觉布景有点不协调.

sentences.en: If Gatherine had got rid of her incongruous lover , she deserved the credit of it.
sentences.cn: 如果凯瑟琳已经摆脱了那个薄情郎, 她应该受到称赞.

sentences.en: She was small and fragile and looked incongruous in an army uniform.
sentences.cn: 她又小又弱，穿一身军装看起来很不协调。

sentences.en: Such traditional methods seem incongruous in our technical age.
sentences.cn: 此类传统方法似乎同我们今天的科技时代格格不入。

sentences.en: The austere college furniture and the large luncheon table made all the more incongruous.
sentences.cn: 朴素的大学家具和一张大餐桌,使这一切愈发显得不调和.

sentences.en: The incongruous falsetto voice took on a musing note.
sentences.cn: 那个不相称的假嗓子里带着一种沉思的声调.

sentences.en: The modern huge building looks incongruous in that old - fashioned village.
sentences.cn: 那座现代化的高楼大厦在那古老的村庄里看上去不协调.

sentences.en: The new theatre looks utterly incongruous in its setting.
sentences.cn: 这座新剧院和周围的环境格格不入。

sentences.en: Their acts are incongruous with their principles.
sentences.cn: 他们的行为与信奉的原则不一致.

sentences.en: Then, a strangely incongruous sight struck her eyes.
sentences.cn: 然后, 她的眼睛接触着一种完全不调和的奇异景象.

sentences.en: These remarks don't have any relationship to the problem at hand; they are incongruous and should be stricken from the record.
sentences.cn: 这些话与眼下的问题无关, 它们是不恰当的,应从记录中删除.

words.tran_cn: 不协调的；不一致的；不和谐的

trans.tran_cn: 不协调的，不一致的，不和谐的，不相称的，异向
trans.tran_en: strange, unexpected, or unsuitable in a particular situation
